info.name: Budlite - Account Groups API
info.description:
Complete Account Group Management API for React Native

This collection covers full CRUD operations for account groups:
- Create account groups with hierarchy
- List with search, filter, and pagination
- View details with relationships
- Update with validation
- Delete with constraints
- Toggle active status

All endpoints require authentication with Bearer token.

query.description: Filter: assets, liabilities, equity, income, expenses
Sort by: name, code, nature, created_at, is_active
